resources.string: You can use Wi-Fi networks to get faster connections and lower data transfer charges

No SIM card could be recognized and the phone can only be used offline, with Wi-Fi, and for emergency calls
Describe the service provider specific applications that are installed and customized in the setup guide.

"Your service provider settings will now be installed and your phone will restart.
This will delete all data from your phone's storage, including Google account, system and application data, settings and downloaded applications. It will not delete installed applications, music or photos."
Do you want the information in online service accounts and applications to be synchronized automatically? Note that this allows data transfers in the background.
Set your preference for home screen, contacts, and player (music and video) apps now? You can also do it later by selecting Settings>Xperia™>Preferred apps settings.
Set your preference for home screen, contacts, and player (music and video) apps. You can change it later by selecting Settings > Xperia™ > Preferred apps settings.
